entry.title: 3.0 kWh Solar Generator
entry.content:
This project was completed at the beginning of 2021. It took around 40 hours over a few months.

Most of this project is based off of LithiumSolar's video

I sourced recycled 2200 mAh modem cells from batteryhookup.com. It's tough to find used 2600 mAh cells, I do have some, but not the 364 required for this project. I ended up being a little less than 3.0 kWh after testing all the cells.

Ended up using kWeld to spot weld. Also sourced 4P nickel strip to simplify.

entry.title: CO2 Monitor
entry.content:
Project based off of Makezine article/post "Fresh Air" and Adafruit's SCD-30 page.

All lot of interest in CO2 for makers was inspired when a school teacher built a CO2 monitor for a classroom and found that the CO2 levels at the end of class were enough to make you groggy/sleepy and not able to learn as well.

One interesting thing I found was how high CO2 levels get in a short driver with windows up. My car (Nissan Sentra) approached 2000 PPM in a 30 minute commute with one person. Having one window down for a minute brought the levels back to below 1000 PPM.
